member.name: ID2D1PrintControl.AddPage
member.summary: Converts Direct2D primitives in the passed-in command list into a fixed page representation for use by the print subsystem.
member.param: The command list that contains the rendering operations.
The size of the page to add.
Contains the first label for subsequent drawing operations. This parameter is passed uninitialized. If NULL is specified, no value is retrieved for this parameter.
Contains the second label for subsequent drawing operations. This parameter is passed uninitialized. If NULL is specified, no value is retrieved for this parameter.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.
The print job is already finished.

member.name: ID2D1PrintControl.Close
member.summary: Passes all remaining resources to the print sub-system, then clean up and close the current print job.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function.
The print job is already finished.

member.name: ID2D1PrintControl
member.summary: Converts Direct2D primitives stored in an into a fixed page representation. The print sub-system then consumes the primitives.
